intro: Oy, my name is SuperHedron. I was Hedron but now I have upgraded. I am running a small Minecraft server for any interested Zeronet users!

post.body: Oy, if there are any Minecraft fans on here feel free to join my server. No rules, just don't be a mong. Connect with: landofsupercool.fluctis.com Version: 1.13.2
Does anyone know of a program like discord, but on Zeronet? Would be quite cool for the future.

comment.body: @Pigpog: Sweet I'll check it out, thanks.
